mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tk_k_general ( applyno, name, nickname, command, power, brain, politic, story ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(applyno), 0)+1 FROM tk_k_general), #{name}, #{nickname}, #{command}, #{power}, #{brain}, #{politic}, #{story} )
mapper.select:
SELECT applyno, name, nickname, command, power, brain, politic, story
FROM tk_k_general ge
ORDER BY ge.applyno DESC
